cancelchangeset.name: CancelChangeSet
cancelchangeset.description: Grants permission to cancel a running change set

completetask.name: CompleteTask
completetask.description: Grants permission to complete an existing task and submit the content to the associated change

deleteresourcepolicy.name: DeleteResourcePolicy
deleteresourcepolicy.description: Grants permission to delete the resource policy of an existing entity

describeassessment.name: DescribeAssessment
describeassessment.description: Grants permission to return the details of an existing assessment

describechangeset.name: DescribeChangeSet
describechangeset.description: Grants permission to return the details of an existing change set

describeentity.name: DescribeEntity
describeentity.description: Grants permission to return the details of an existing entity

describetask.name: DescribeTask
describetask.description: Grants permission to return the details of an existing task

getresourcepolicy.name: GetResourcePolicy
getresourcepolicy.description: Grants permission to get the resource policy of an existing entity

listassessments.name: ListAssessments
listassessments.description: Grants permission to list existing assessments

listchangesets.name: ListChangeSets
listchangesets.description: Grants permission to list existing change sets

listentities.name: ListEntities
listentities.description: Grants permission to list existing entities

listtagsforresource.name: ListTagsForResource
listtagsforresource.description: Grants permission to list tags for a deployment parameter resource

listtasks.name: ListTasks
listtasks.description: Grants permission to list existing tasks

putresourcepolicy.name: PutResourcePolicy
putresourcepolicy.description: Grants permission to attach a resource policy to an existing entity

startchangeset.name: StartChangeSet
startchangeset.description: Grants permission to request a new change set (Note: resource-level permissions for this action and condition context keys for this action are only supported when used with Catalog API and are not supported when used with AWS Marketplace Management Portal)

tagresource.name: TagResource
tagresource.description: Grants permission to tag a deployment parameter resource

untagresource.name: UntagResource
untagresource.description: Grants permission to untag a deployment parameter resource

updatetask.name: UpdateTask
updatetask.description: Grants permission to update the contents of an existing task

putdeploymentparameter.name: PutDeploymentParameter
putdeploymentparameter.description: Grants permission to create or update a deployment parameter resource

listprivatelistings.name: ListPrivateListings
listprivatelistings.description: Grants permission to users to list their private offers

getentitlements.name: GetEntitlements
getentitlements.description: Grants permission to retrieve entitlement values for a given product. The results can be filtered based on customer identifier or product dimensions

describebuilds.name: DescribeBuilds
describebuilds.description: Describes Image Builds identified by a build Id

batchmeterusage.name: BatchMeterUsage
batchmeterusage.description: Grants permission to post metering records for a set of customers for SaaS applications

meterusage.name: MeterUsage
meterusage.description: Grants permission to emit metering records

registerusage.name: RegisterUsage
registerusage.description: Grants permission to to verify that the customer running your paid software is subscribed to your product on AWS Marketplace, enabling you to guard against unauthorized use. Meters software use per ECS task, per hour, with usage prorated to the second

resolvecustomer.name: ResolveCustomer
resolvecustomer.description: Grants permission to resolve a registration token to obtain a CustomerIdentifier and product code

associateproductswithprivatemarketplace.name: AssociateProductsWithPrivateMarketplace
associateproductswithprivatemarketplace.description: Grants permission to approve a request for a product to be associated with the Private Marketplace. This action can be performed by any account in an AWS Organization, provided the user has permissions to do so, and the Organization's Service Control Policies allow it

createprivatemarketplacerequests.name: CreatePrivateMarketplaceRequests
createprivatemarketplacerequests.description: Grants permission to create a new request for a product or products to be associated with the Private Marketplace. This action can be performed by any account in an in an AWS Organization, provided the user has permissions to do so, and the Organization's Service Control Policies allow it

describeprivatemarketplacerequests.name: DescribePrivateMarketplaceRequests
describeprivatemarketplacerequests.description: Grants permission to describe requests and associated products in the Private Marketplace. This action can be performed by any account in an AWS Organization, provided the user has permissions to do so, and the Organization's Service Control Policies allow it

disassociateproductsfromprivatemarketpla.name: DisassociateProductsFromPrivateMarketplace
disassociateproductsfromprivatemarketpla.description: Grants permission to decline a request for a product to be associated with the Private Marketplace. This action can be performed by any account in an AWS Organization, provided the user has permissions to do so, and the Organization's Service Control Policies allow it

listprivatemarketplacerequests.name: ListPrivateMarketplaceRequests
listprivatemarketplacerequests.description: Grants permission to get a queryable list for requests and associated products in the Private Marketplace. This action can be performed by any account in an AWS Organization, provided the user has permissions to do so, and the Organization's Service Control Policies allow it

describeprocurementsystemconfiguration.name: DescribeProcurementSystemConfiguration
describeprocurementsystemconfiguration.description: Grants permission to describe the Procurement System integration configuration (e.g. Coupa) for the individual account, or for the entire AWS Organization if one exists. This action can only be performed by the master account if using an AWS Organization

putprocurementsystemconfiguration.name: PutProcurementSystemConfiguration
putprocurementsystemconfiguration.description: Grants permission to create or update the Procurement System integration configuration (e.g. Coupa) for the individual account, or for the entire AWS Organization if one exists. This action can only be performed by the master account if using an AWS Organization

getbuyerdashboard.name: GetBuyerDashboard
getbuyerdashboard.description: Grants permission to view a dashboard that shows a buyer's AWS Marketplace purchase data

getsellerdashboard.name: GetSellerDashboard
getsellerdashboard.description: Grants permission to view a seller dashboard

acceptagreementapprovalrequest.name: AcceptAgreementApprovalRequest
acceptagreementapprovalrequest.description: Grants permission to users to approve an incoming subscription request (for providers who provide products that require subscription verification)

acceptagreementrequest.name: AcceptAgreementRequest
acceptagreementrequest.description: Grants permission to users to accept their agreement requests. Note that this action is not applicable to Marketplace purchases

cancelagreement.name: CancelAgreement
cancelagreement.description: Grants permission to users to cancel their agreements. Note that this action is not applicable to Marketplace purchases

cancelagreementrequest.name: CancelAgreementRequest
cancelagreementrequest.description: Grants permission to users to cancel pending subscription requests for products that require subscription verification

createagreementrequest.name: CreateAgreementRequest
createagreementrequest.description: Grants permission to users to create an agreement request. Note that this action is not applicable to Marketplace purchases

describeagreement.name: DescribeAgreement
describeagreement.description: Grants permission to users to describe the metadata about the agreement

getagreementapprovalrequest.name: GetAgreementApprovalRequest
getagreementapprovalrequest.description: Grants permission to users to view the details of their incoming subscription requests (for providers who provide products that require subscription verification)

getagreementrequest.name: GetAgreementRequest
getagreementrequest.description: Grants permission to users to view the details of their subscription requests for data products that require subscription verification

getagreementterms.name: GetAgreementTerms
getagreementterms.description: Grants permission to users to get a list of terms for an agreement

listagreementapprovalrequests.name: ListAgreementApprovalRequests
listagreementapprovalrequests.description: Grants permission to users to list their incoming subscription requests (for providers who provide products that require subscription verification)

listagreementcharges.name: ListAgreementCharges
listagreementcharges.description: Grants permission to users to view charges associated with their agreements

listagreementrequests.name: ListAgreementRequests
listagreementrequests.description: Grants permission to users to list their subscription requests for products that require subscription verification

listentitlementdetails.name: ListEntitlementDetails
listentitlementdetails.description: Grants permission to users to view details of the entitlements associated with an agreement. Note that this action is not applicable to Marketplace purchases

rejectagreementapprovalrequest.name: RejectAgreementApprovalRequest
rejectagreementapprovalrequest.description: Grants permission to users to decline an incoming subscription requests (for providers who provide products that require subscription verification)

searchagreements.name: SearchAgreements
searchagreements.description: Grants permission to users to search their agreements

subscribe.name: Subscribe
subscribe.description: Grants permission to users to subscribe to AWS Marketplace products. Includes the ability to send a subscription request for products that require subscription verification. Includes the ability to enable auto-renewal for an existing subscription

unsubscribe.name: Unsubscribe
unsubscribe.description: Grants permission to users to remove subscriptions to AWS Marketplace products. Includes the ability to disable auto-renewal for an existing subscription

updateagreementapprovalrequest.name: UpdateAgreementApprovalRequest
updateagreementapprovalrequest.description: Grants permission to users to make changes to an incoming subscription request, including the ability to delete the prospective subscriber's information (for providers who provide products that require subscription verification)

updatepurchaseorders.name: UpdatePurchaseOrders
updatepurchaseorders.description: Grants permission to users to update purchase orders for charges associated with their agreements

viewsubscriptions.name: ViewSubscriptions
viewsubscriptions.description: Grants permission to users to see their account's subscriptions
